hero.title: Write the ending
hero.description: Tell your breakup, resignation or any departure on a styled page, guided by our animated chatbot. Share it or keep it secret.

about.title: Open the door to your truth
about.description: Ici, chaque fin devient un nouveau commencement. Franchis le seuil de TheEnd.page et transforme ta rupture, ta démission ou la fin de ton projet en une page unique à ton image.

card1.title: Cross the threshold
card1.description: Lume, our empathetic bot, welcomes you and helps you express your emotions.

card2.title: Unfold your story
card2.description: Share your memories and feelings through a simple and visual editor.

card3.title: Reflect
card3.description: Publish anonymously or share your page directly with whomever you choose, then close this door gracefully.

accordion1.question: What is TheEnd.page?
accordion1.response: TheEnd.page is a platform to create a personalized page when you're ending something: a breakup, a resignation, a project, a Discord group… Here, you can express yourself, choose your style, and turn the page your own way.

accordion2.question: Can I send my page to a specific person?
accordion2.response: Yes. You can share it via a link, by email, or simply publish it in the community. It's up to you who gets to read your final words.

accordion3.question: Does my page disappear after a while?
accordion3.response: Some pages can self-destruct after being read, like an emotional Snap. You can also choose to keep it visible longer, or turn it into a permanent memory.

accordion4.question: Is it accessible on mobile?
accordion4.response: Yes, it's 100% responsive. Whether you're in bed, on the subway, or on a bench after a heavy conversation, your ending is always within reach.

cta.text:
Because every
chaque ending deserves
to be heard.

footer.footerText: A confession. A creation. A step towards something else.
